New Development: metaTip web-based Tip Jar system

10
Dec0
Hot:

Personal.
So, your a dancer, DJ, escort…you shake what your momma gave you.  You have your tip jar that you put out or someone scripted for you.  It tracks how much money you’ve made since you rezzed it, but have you ever wondered how much money you’ve brought in today…maybe you want to know about how much you bring a week, a month, this year?  The metaTip will do just that.  It’s like whoa.  The metaTip will be the last tip jar you will ever need.  Do you prefer your tip jar rezzed or floating above your head?  Do you like blue or green? Maybe pink? Want a sexy thank you message? You got it.

The metaTip requires almost no setup whatsoever.  There’s no notecard to edit, and you don’t have to know how to script to make it work.  Payments are tracked automatically and processed in a database.  And best of all…charts and graphs.  Oh yeah.  I’ll say it again…charts and graphs.  Track your daily performance, monthly performance, *quarterly performance, and *yearly performance.

Coming soon to the Sublime Geek HQ!  Contact Jon Desmoulins if you want more info or have feedback.

Commercial.
Do you have employeed Dancers, Escorts, and/or DJs? Do you want to track their tips? Do you pay your Security staff or other supplimental staff with a portion of your dancer’s tips? This system is for you. The commercial version of the metaTip system will track all of your employees’ tips, the customers who tip them, and the payments to your staff.  Create groups of employees you want to manage and the system will automatically divide the funds appropriately.  Get automatic reports on who is your most-tipped employee.  Find out who is your most generous tipper.

metaTip is still in development, but more information will be posted here as it comes.
